comments.author: han.solo61@web.de
comments.text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:2.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:2.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0

Everytime when I open (and close) the "Customize"-window (sorry, if the term isn't correct since I use the German version; in German it's "Anpassen") e.g. in order to change the Firefox buttons/symbols, the field of the search bar is emptied.

I don't know if this is intended since this behaviour was already in former version (3.x) but I'd appreciate if this could be fixed/changed.

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Type in anything in the search bar.
2. Open the "Customize"-window (in German you can access it via "Ansicht -> Symbolleisten -> Anpassen")
3. The the "Customize"-window.
Actual Results:  
Search bar field is cleared

Expected Results:  
Search bar field contains last input

comments.raw_text: That has absolutely nothing to do with the version field which is used in Toolkit to show the first affected version of Firefox.
